name: This Crazy Robot - Pizza Tonight
description:
The future is now!

Play a pizza delivery robot, build with the latest and greatest technology. 
Unfortunately, you have just 8 MB ram as a cost saving measure, making the delivery not as easy as you would think. Your objective is to collect and deliver all the pizza. Just pick it up and deliver it to the orange tiles, sounds easy right?
Well, kind of. Thanks to the cost saving measure of your organic overlords you can barely remember memory to remember the amount of your fingers (Its 0). So you have to make your advanced AI path finding calculations 5 moves at a time. 
So think fast before the pizza gets cold, don't run into trees and beware of the potholes. 


Controls:

Up
Move forwards
DownMove backwards
LeftTurn LeftRightTurn rightSpaceJump
